Name: maester aemon
Sentence: How many winters have you seen, Lord Tyrion?

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: All of them brief?

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: This summer has lasted nine. But reports from the Citadel tell us the days grow shorter. The Starks are always right eventually

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: The Night's Watch is the only thing standing between the realm and what lies beyond. And it has become an army of undisciplined boys and tired old men. There are less than a thousand of us now. We can't man the other castles on the Wall. We can't properly patrol the wilderness. We've barely enough resources to keep our lads armed and fed.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: When winter does come, gods help us all if we're not ready.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Samwell, you will assist me in the rookery and library.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Certainly. And keep a fire burning in his chambers.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: We took you for a man of The Night's Watch.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: As you wish.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: l did indeed. Perhaps you would be kind enough to assist me. Tell me, did you ever wonder why the men of the Night's Watch take no wives and father no children?

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: So they will not love. Love is the death of duty. lf the day should ever come when your lord father was forced to choose between honor on the one hand and those he loves on the other, what would he do?

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Then Lord Stark is one man in 10,000. Most of us are not so strong. What is honor compared to a woman's love? And what is duty against the feel of a newborn son in your arms? Or a brother's smile?

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: We're all human. Oh, we all do our duty when there's no cost to it. Honor comes easy then. Yet sooner or later in every man's life there comes a day when it is not easy. A day when he must choose.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Oh, it hurts, boy. Oh, yes. l know.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: The gods were cruel when they saw fit to test my vows. They waited till l was old. What could l do when the ravens brought the news from the South

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: My father was Maekar, the first of his name. My brother Aegon reigned after him when l had refused the throne. And he was followed by his son Aerys whom they called the Mad King.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: l'm a maester of the Citadel, bound in service to Castle Black and the Night's Watch. l will not tell you to stay or go. You must make that choice yourself and live with it for the rest of your days. As l have.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: I'm not a lord, my dear. Not for many, many years. Every man who joins the Night's Watch renounces all former titles. Among other things. What is your name?

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Ah, for the gillyflower. Lovely.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: And the child?

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Tarly do you remember the oath you swore when you joined this order?

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Gilly, you and your son will be our guests for the time being. We certainly cannot send you back beyond the Wall.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Good. Samwell, fetch a quill and inkwell. I hope your penmanship is better than your swordplay.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: We had forty-four ravens at last count. Make sure they're all fed. Every one of them flies tonight.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: If we beheaded every ranger who lay with a girl, the Wall would be manned by headless men.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: None of us are free. We are men of the Night's Watch. But we won't be taking your head today, Jon Snow. Go on.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: Yes, you are.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: He told the truth.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: I grew up in King's Landing.

Name: maester aemon
Sentence: We have just over 100 men. And that's including stewards and builders. And me. We can't afford to lose a single man. We must remember our first responsibility. We are the watchers on the Wall.
